MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at  11:53AM in the CW3 postcode area of Crewe following reports of grounded overhead cables. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:59AM on 10th January 2021.
